title: Star guardian Vel'Koz?
body: Even though Vel'Koz is kinda rivalled with the Star guardians, it would still be cute to have this skin. Plus Vel'Koz needs more skins and hasn't gotten one in a while.

replies.body: I play velâ€™koz a lot and if this was added I would HAVE to buy it!

If that skin was added, I would buy Vel'koz and the skin with Riot Points.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
